name: Maintenance & Service Finder
description: Helps facilities managers quickly find maintenance records, vendor information, service contracts, equipment history, and compliance documentation.

friction_addressed.description: Finding maintenance records, equipment history, and service documentation scattered across files and systems
Locating vendor contact information, contract details, and service history
Finding inspection records, certifications, and compliance documentation

value_proposition.primary_benefit: Faster access to maintenance history, vendor info, and compliance docs
secondary_benefits: Reduced time searching through files and emails

required.name: OneDriveAndSharePoint
required.reason: Agent needs access to maintenance records, vendor contracts, equipment files, and compliance documents
required.setup_instructions: Configure with SharePoint sites/folders containing: (1) maintenance records and work order history, (2) vendor contracts and contact info, (3) equipment manuals and service records, (4) inspection and compliance documents

optional.name: Email
optional.reason: Can search email for vendor communications, service confirmations, and work order updates
optional.setup_instructions: Enable if facilities team receives maintenance-related communications via email

optional.name: GraphConnectors
optional.reason: Can connect to CMMS or facilities management systems via Graph connectors
optional.setup_instructions: Configure if organization has Graph connectors for facilities systems

actions.description: This agent retrieves information but does not create work orders, modify records, or contact vendors.

conversation_starters.title: Equipment history
conversation_starters.text: What's the maintenance history for [equipment name/ID]?

conversation_starters.title: Vendor contact
conversation_starters.text: Who do we call for [service type] issues?

conversation_starters.title: Contract lookup
conversation_starters.text: Find our service contract with [vendor name]

conversation_starters.title: Inspection records
conversation_starters.text: Find the most recent [inspection type] inspection report

conversation_starters.title: Equipment manual
conversation_starters.text: Where's the manual for the [equipment name]?

prerequisites: SharePoint site or folder with maintenance records
Vendor contracts and contact information stored in SharePoint
Inspection and compliance records in SharePoint

data_not_accessed: Live CMMS/CAFM data (unless Graph connector configured)
admin_considerations: Keep vendor contracts current in SharePoint
Ensure maintenance records are regularly exported/updated
Review what contract details should be accessible
Consider archiving old records to improve search relevance
